name: .TT24
summary: Learn about .TT24 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open TT24 files with the desktop version of Intuit Canada TurboTax 2024 in Windows. To open a TT24 file with the software, select File → Open Tax Return.

If you are filing your 2025 tax return using TurboTax Canada Online, you can upload a TT24 file to import your 2024 tax data. To do this, go to My Returns → Start a new return, choose your TurboTax product, select TurboTax Download/CD, click Continue, and then upload your TT24 file.
